import React, {Component} from 'react'; import API from "../utils/API"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; function listItem() { const [item, setItem] = useState({}) return ( <>
Title:{item.title}

Description:{item.description}

  • Location:{item.location}
  • Price:{item.price}
  • Contact Person: {item.userName}
  • Phone: {item.phone}
Rent Item
) } export default listItem
